test_message: Generate a professional intro pitch presentation for Acme Corp, a Technology company. Key pain points: Legacy systems causing downtime. Products to highlight: CloudSync Platform. Tone: Professional. Number of slides: 3.
expected_purpose: Generate a PPTX file using code interpreter and return it as a downloadable file
validation_errors: Response is not valid JSON: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

actual_response.raw_text:
Great! I’ll generate a concise, professional 3-slide intro pitch presentation for Acme Corp, focusing on legacy system downtime and your CloudSync Platform. Here’s the structure:

1. Title Slide (Acme Corp | Technology Solutions Pitch)
2. Pain Point Slide (Legacy Systems Causing Downtime)
3. Solution/Product Highlight (CloudSync Platform Overview)

Speaker notes will be included for each slide. Let me create the PPTX file for you now.
